import Icon from "../assets/icons8-liverpoolfc-48.svg";

export const birthday = {
  year: 1994,
  month: 1,
  date: 21,
};

export const getAge = (birthday) => {
  const today = new Date();
  const thisYearsBirthday = new Date(today.getFullYear(), birthday.month-1, birthday.date);
  const age = today.getFullYear() - birthday.year;

  if(today < thisYearsBirthday) age--;

return age;
}

export const age = getAge(birthday);
